AAI.caption: Content
AAI.doc: The raw content of the file.
AAI.name: content

AAJ.caption: File name
AAJ.doc: The name of the file, including the extension.
AAJ.name: filename

AAm.caption: This action will create the file and automatically upload it to your Bubble database, returning the URL on next actions. This action is executed on server-side, so you can use it on backend workflows, but be aware that this consumes WUs.
AAm.name: warning

AAt.caption: App URL
AAt.doc: The home URL of your app (e.g https://yourdomai.com).
AAt.name: appUrl
